attributes.action: Put all options, back to the people We voted to leave, but not how.
attributes.additional_details:
Put back to the people a set of options, so we can decide how we are to Leave. 
Examples: 
1) Leave but whole UK keeps the customs union
 2) Common market 2.0 
3) Leave with WTO rules and create an independent trade deal with the EU 
4) Leave with Mrs Mays deal (at time of writing) 
5) Take mainland out entirely, but N.Ireland stays in the customs union.
attributes.background: The British people voted to leave the EU, but it has been left to politicians to decide how. MP’s cannot decide how, so the people should vote on this and it should be binding.
